name: Zeus Battlegrounds
description:
Cast down to Earth from Mount Olympus, you are one of Zeus' 100 half-human, half-god, children. You are all Demigods, and all powerful. But there can be only one that completes the trial of the day to beat this epic survival challenge.

Step into the world of the ancient Greeks and get ready for non-stop PvP action. When 100 players fall to Earth at the same time, the battle to survive begins.

Featuring a massive game world with melee and ranged weapons, as well as Demigod abilities, players are under pressure to find powerful armor and gear-up for the ultimate showdown.

As time passes, Zeus' Will pushes players to a central point where a single victor can be declared. Only the smartest, strongest and fastest players will find themselves standing alone alongside Zeus when the challenge ends.

May the gods favor your actions!
